casebody.data:
State
v.
Antwan Anthony 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 1, 2017 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, for Anthony, Antwan. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of January 2017 by Defendant for Stay of Appellate Proceedings in Light of Pending Racial Justice Act Motion:

*372"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of February 2017."
